_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate admin panel copy. Admin is for SaaS owner/operators.
_meta.note: Admin copy should be professional, efficient, and data-focused. Target audience: business owners, not end users.

page.title: Main admin page title. Ex: 'Admin Dashboard', 'Admin Panel', 'Platform Management'
page.description: Page description. Explain what admin can do here. Ex: 'Manage your SaaS platform, configure settings, and view analytics'

nav.dashboard: Nav link to admin dashboard. Ex: 'Dashboard', 'Overview'
nav.emails: Nav link to email journeys management. Ex: 'Email Journeys', 'Automated Emails'
nav.users: Nav link to user management. Ex: 'Users', 'User Management'
nav.backToApp: Link to exit admin and return to main app. Ex: 'Back to App', 'Exit Admin'

stats.title: Section heading for business metrics. Ex: 'Business Metrics', 'Key Stats', 'Overview'
stats.totalUsers: Metric label for total registered users. Ex: 'Total Users', 'Registered Users'
stats.totalUsersDesc: Description explaining what this metric means. Ex: 'All registered users on the platform'
stats.activeSubscriptions: Metric label for paying customers. Ex: 'Active Subscriptions', 'Paying Customers'
stats.activeSubscriptionsDesc: Description. Ex: 'Users with active paid plans'
stats.trialUsers: Metric label for trial users. Ex: 'Trial Users', 'In Trial'
stats.trialUsersDesc: Description. Ex: 'Users currently in trial period'
stats.mrr: Metric label for monthly recurring revenue. Use industry acronym. Ex: 'MRR', 'Monthly Revenue'
stats.mrrDesc: Description. Ex: 'Total monthly revenue from subscriptions', 'Recurring revenue (monthly)'
stats.newUsersThisMonth: Metric label for recent growth. Ex: 'New Users This Month', 'New Signups'
stats.canceledSubscriptions: Metric label for churn. Ex: 'Canceled Subscriptions', 'Churned'
stats.canceledSubscriptionsDesc: Description. Ex: 'Subscriptions that have been canceled'

crossSell.title: Section heading for recommended products/add-ons. Ex: 'Recommended Add-ons', 'Boost Your SaaS'
crossSell.description: Section description. Ex: 'Boost your SaaS with these premium features', 'Recommended tools for your stack'

infoBar.pageTitle: Page title for info-bar settings. Ex: 'Info-Bar Settings - Admin', 'Global Banner'
infoBar.pageDescription: Page description. Ex: 'Configure the global information banner'
infoBar.title: Section heading. Ex: 'Global Info Bar', 'Site-Wide Banner'
infoBar.description: Section description explaining what info-bar does. Ex: 'Configure a banner to show important messages across your app'
infoBar.enabled: Toggle label to enable/disable info-bar. Ex: 'Enable info bar', 'Show banner'
infoBar.enabledDescription: Help text for enable toggle. Ex: 'Show the info bar to users'

scope.label: Field label for display scope. Ex: 'Display on', 'Show on pages'
scope.help: Help text explaining options. Ex: 'Choose which pages should show the info bar'
scope.all: Option to show on all pages. Ex: 'All pages', 'Everywhere'
scope.authenticated: Option to show only to logged-in users. Ex: 'Only authenticated pages', 'Logged-in users only'
scope.unauthenticated: Option to show only to visitors. Ex: 'Only public pages', 'Visitors only'

mode.label: Field label for visual style. Ex: 'Style', 'Type', 'Mode'
mode.help: Help text explaining when to use each mode. Ex: 'Choose the visual style based on message importance'

messages.label: Field label for message texts. Ex: 'Messages', 'Banner Text'
messages.placeholder: Placeholder text for message input. Ex: 'Enter message text...', 'Type your message...'

infoBar.dismissible: Toggle label for allowing users to dismiss. Ex: 'Dismissible', 'Allow dismiss'
infoBar.dismissibleDescription: Help text. Ex: 'Allow users to dismiss the banner'
infoBar.save: Button to save settings. Ex: 'Save Settings', 'Update'
infoBar.success: Success message after save. Ex: 'Info bar settings updated successfully', 'Settings saved!'

emailJourneys.title: Section heading for email journey controls. Ex: 'Email Journey Control', 'Automated Campaigns'
emailJourneys.description: Section description. Ex: 'Activate or deactivate automated email campaigns with one click'
emailJourneys.journeyEnabled: Success message when journey activated. Ex: 'Journey activated', 'Campaign enabled'
emailJourneys.journeyDisabled: Success message when journey deactivated. Ex: 'Journey deactivated', 'Campaign disabled'
emailJourneys.error: Error message when toggle fails. Ex: 'Failed to update email journey. Please try again.'

page.title: Page title for email journeys page. Ex: 'Email Journeys - Admin', 'Email Campaigns'
page.description: Page description. Ex: 'Manage automated email campaigns and notifications'

page.title: Page title for settings page. Ex: 'Settings - Admin', 'Configuration'
page.description: Page description. Ex: 'Configure global application settings'

users.pageTitle: Page title for user management. Ex: 'User Management - Admin', 'Users'
users.pageDescription: Page description. Ex: 'Manage users and admin permissions'
users.title: Section heading. Ex: 'User Management', 'Platform Users'
users.description: Section description. Ex: 'Manage platform users and assign admin permissions'
users.searchPlaceholder: Search input placeholder. Ex: 'Search users by name...', 'Find a user...'

filters.all: Filter option to show all users. Ex: 'All Users', 'Everyone'
filters.admins: Filter option to show only admins. Ex: 'Admins Only', 'Administrators'
filters.users: Filter option to show only regular users. Ex: 'Regular Users', 'Users'

table.user: Column header for user info. Ex: 'User', 'Name'
table.role: Column header for role. Ex: 'Role', 'Permission Level'
table.subscription: Column header for subscription status. Ex: 'Subscription', 'Plan'
table.actions: Column header for action buttons. Ex: 'Actions', 'Manage'

users.promote: Button to make user an admin. Ex: 'Make Admin', 'Promote to Admin'
users.demote: Button to remove admin privileges. Ex: 'Remove Admin', 'Demote'
users.promoted: Success message after promoting user. Ex: 'User promoted to admin successfully'
users.demoted: Success message after demoting admin. Ex: 'Admin privileges removed successfully'
users.promoteFailed: Error message when promotion fails. Ex: 'Failed to promote user'
users.demoteFailed: Error message when demotion fails. Ex: 'Failed to remove admin privileges'
users.you: Badge showing current user. Ex: '(You)', '(Current User)'
users.noUsers: Message when no users exist (unlikely). Ex: 'No users found'
users.noResults: Message when search/filter has no results. Ex: 'No users match your search'
users.noSubscription: Label when user has no active subscription. Ex: 'No subscription', 'Free'
users.showing: Label showing filtered results count. Include {count} and {total} placeholders. Ex: 'Showing {count} of {total} users'

crisp.title: Section heading for Crisp chat settings. Ex: 'Crisp Chat', 'Customer Support Chat'
crisp.description: Section description. Ex: 'Configure customer support chat for your application'
crisp.notConfigured: Warning when Crisp not set up. Ex: 'Crisp is not configured. Add your Crisp Website ID to enable customer support chat.'
crisp.setupInstructions: Heading for setup instructions. Ex: 'To enable Crisp, add your Website ID to environment variables:'
crisp.enabled: Toggle to enable/disable chat. Ex: 'Enable Crisp Chat', 'Show chat widget'
crisp.enabledHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Show the customer support chat widget'
crisp.scope: Label for who sees the chat. Ex: 'Show Chat For', 'Display to'
crisp.scopeHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Control which users see the chat widget'

scopes.all: Option for everyone. Ex: 'Everyone (all pages)', 'All visitors'
scopes.authenticated: Option for logged-in users. Ex: 'Logged-in users only', 'Authenticated only'
scopes.unauthenticated: Option for visitors. Ex: 'Visitors only (marketing pages)', 'Public pages'
scopes.subscribers_only: Option for paying customers. Ex: 'Paying subscribers only', 'Customers only'

crisp.position: Label for chat position. Ex: 'Chat Position', 'Widget Position'

positions.right: Option for bottom right. Ex: 'Bottom Right'
positions.left: Option for bottom left. Ex: 'Bottom Left'

crisp.hideOnMobile: Toggle to hide on mobile. Ex: 'Hide on Mobile', 'Desktop only'
crisp.hideOnMobileHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Don't show the chat widget on mobile devices'
crisp.locale: Label for language setting. Ex: 'Language', 'Chat Language'
crisp.localeHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Choose the chat interface language'
crisp.save: Button to save settings. Ex: 'Save Settings', 'Update'
crisp.saved: Success message. Ex: 'Support settings saved successfully', 'Settings updated!'
crisp.saveError: Error message. Ex: 'Failed to save support settings'

affiliates.title: Section heading for affiliate settings. Ex: 'Affiliate Program Settings', 'Partner Configuration'
affiliates.description: Section description. Ex: 'Configure your affiliate program and Rewardful integration'
affiliates.enable: Toggle to enable program. Ex: 'Enable Affiliate Program', 'Activate partners'
affiliates.enableDescription: Help text. Ex: 'Activate the affiliate program to allow partners to earn commissions'
affiliates.displayOptions: Subsection heading for display settings. Ex: 'Display Options', 'Visibility'
affiliates.displayHeader: Toggle for showing in header menu. Ex: 'Show in Header Menu', 'Header link'
affiliates.displayFooter: Toggle for showing in footer. Ex: 'Show in Footer', 'Footer link'
affiliates.displayHome: Toggle for showing module on homepage. Ex: 'Show Module on Home Page', 'Homepage section'
affiliates.displayHomeHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Display affiliate module on the home page to drive signups'
affiliates.rewardfulConfiguration: Subsection heading for Rewardful config. Ex: 'Rewardful Configuration', 'Integration Settings'
affiliates.rewardfulUrl: Label for Rewardful form URL. Ex: 'Rewardful Form URL', 'Signup Form URL'
affiliates.rewardfulUrlHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Enter the signup form URL from your Rewardful dashboard'
affiliates.commissionRate: Label for commission rate. Ex: 'Commission Rate', 'Partner Commission'
affiliates.commissionRateHelp: Help text explaining it's display-only. Ex: 'Display only - actual rates are configured in Rewardful'
affiliates.averageSalePrice: Label for avg sale price. Ex: 'Average Sale Price', 'Typical Sale'
affiliates.averageSalePriceHelp: Help text. Ex: 'The average price per sale used in the earnings calculator'
affiliates.calculatorEnabled: Toggle for earnings calculator. Ex: 'Enable Calculator', 'Show calculator'
affiliates.calculatorEnabledHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Show the earnings calculator on the affiliate page'
affiliates.webhookEndpoint: Label for webhook URL. Ex: 'Webhook Endpoint', 'Callback URL'
affiliates.webhookEndpointHelp: Help text. Ex: 'Copy this URL and add it to your Rewardful webhook settings'
affiliates.webhookCopied: Success message after copying. Ex: 'Webhook URL copied to clipboard', 'Copied!'
affiliates.webhookCopyFailed: Error message when copy fails. Ex: 'Failed to copy webhook URL'
affiliates.saveFailed: Error message. Ex: 'Failed to save settings'
affiliates.setupInstructions: Heading for setup guide. Ex: 'Setup Instructions:', 'How to set up'
affiliates.instruction1: Step 1. Ex: 'Create an account at getrewardful.com'
affiliates.instruction2: Step 2. Ex: 'Copy your affiliate signup form URL'
affiliates.instruction3: Step 3. Ex: 'Add the webhook endpoint to Rewardful'
affiliates.instruction4: Step 4. Ex: 'Configure commission rates in Rewardful'
